name: Richard C. CURRAN, Petitioner v. Hon. William H. WIEST, President Judge, Northumberland County, Respondent

parties: Richard C. CURRAN, Petitioner v. Hon. William H. WIEST, President Judge, Northumberland County, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 11th day of December, 2014, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED, and the Prothonotary is DIRECTED to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
105 A.3d 660
Richard C. CURRAN, Petitioner v. Hon. William H. WIEST, President Judge, Northumberland County, Respondent.
No. 176 MM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 11, 2014.
